27324130.VoiceDir19.6D03F: Thoughtful. Your companion has reminded you that living a life without purpose is a waste, something you've been guilty of.

28212CD1.Line7.8CA44: Ah, Deckard, do you remember the smell of the salt air on the ocean?  No shade or devil could stand in our way!

311F0C80.VoiceDir9.8CA44: bittersweet. Your youth was exciting but you have wasted your years since.

6F4EA45C.Line11.8CA44: One foot in front of the other, eh, old friend? If we stop walking, we die!

972A92FE.VoiceDir7.8CA44: wistful. Remembering a past life of excitement.

C215A653.Line9.8CA44: Been all across this world since then. Seen things you wouldn’t believe, but it was never quite the same. Wandering without a direction… it was just… waiting...

D6FC1563.Line19.6D03F: Aye, it’s important to have something to walk towards.
